app_title: === UBUNTU LENANEO LA GO NTSHAFATSA THULAGANYO ===
no_root: Lenaneo le ga le a tshwanela go dirisediwa jaaka root!
internet_error: Phoso: Ga go na golagano ya internet e e bonweng!
timeshift_missing: Timeshift ga e a tsenywa. Ga go na snapshot e e dirilweng.
snapshot_failed: Temoso: Go dira snapshot go palegile
update_error: Phoso ya go ntshafatsa lenane la dithulaganyo
packages_count: Palo ya dithulaganyo tse di tla ntshafatsiwang: %d
packages_list: Lenane la dithulaganyo tse di tla ntshafatsiwang:
no_packages: Ga go na dithulaganyo tse di tla ntshafatsiwang
install_error: Phoso ya go tsenya dintshafatso tsa dithulaganyo
dist_error: Temoso: Phoso ka nako ya dist-upgrade
removing_obsolete: Re tlosa dithulaganyo tse di kgakalaganeng...
autoremove_error: Temoso: Phoso ka nako ya autoremove
autoclean_error: Temoso: Phoso ka nako ya autoclean
snap_error: Phoso ya go ntshafatsa dithulaganyo tsa Snap
flatpak_error: Phoso ya go ntshafatsa dithulaganyo tsa Flatpak
no_reboot: Ga go na reboot e e tlhokegang
reboot_message: Reboot e a tlhokega go fetsa dintshafatso.
reboot_prompt: A o batla go dira reboot jaanong? (y/N):
reboot_later: Se lebale go dira reboot moragonyana!
help_description: uubu - Sedirisiwa sa ntshafatso se se itirelong sa Ubuntu/Kubuntu
help_desc_long:
uubu (Update Upgrade Ubuntu) e dira dintshafatso tsotlhe tsa thulaganyo ka go itiragala.
E ntshafatsa APT, Snap, Flatpak, e phepafatsa thulaganyo mme e neela reboot fa go tlhokega.
help_example_1: # Ntshafatso e e feletseng ya tlwaelo
help_example_3: # Ntshafatso ya mokgwa o o didimetseng
flag_snapshot: Dira snapshot ya Timeshift pele ga ntshafatso
flag_quiet: Mokgwa o o didimetseng (melaetsa e e kwa tlase)
flag_dist_upgrade: Dira tokafatso ya tsela yotlhe ya tsamaiso (e akaretsa go tlosa disetshwantsho tse di kgologolo)
upgrade: Go tlhola ditokafatso tsa disetshwantsho tse di leng teng...
